_sText:
=======================
zm_4way_spacetunnel_idm_v1f

Original 4way made by: Neko_Daisuki 

Spacetunnel remake made by: [ZFC] idm

Some of the most used textures made by: [ZFC] Satch
=======================

-==READ EVERYTHING PLEASE==-


IMPORTANT FOR ADMINS: 4way_spacetunnel is a big map. If you want people to be able to
download the map directly from your server, you must use this command:

net_maxfilesize 60

Default 16mb. 4way_spacetunnel is 54mb.

Without this command changed to 54, people will not be able to download it and will get
an error message like "Map zm_4way_spacetunnel_idm_v1f.bsp is missing".
----->If your server BZIPs the map you're ok.


-----------------------------
Map Information:

Filesize: 54 mb
Spawnpoints: 72
Special Features: 2 spaceships (1 drivable), no fall damage
Custom Textures Used: yes
Custom Sounds Used: yes
------------------------------

INSTALLATION:
-----------------

Copy the cstrike folder into your "".../steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/"
folder. Click yes to all and you are done.

IMPORTANT: This map uses a point_servercommand to set sv_turbophysics to 0. Otherwise
you won't be able to fly in the little spaceship. When your server has banned "point_servercommand" then use the cfg file that is packed into the rar file.

--------------------------------------------------------------
A couple of features:

* 2 Spaceships! And one of those you can drive yourself!
* No fall damage!
* New elevators
* New buildings.
* Well balanced spots, not impossible for zombies and not to easy
* 1 "secret" where you can blow up the drivable spaceship with. 
(opens 3 minutes after someone got into the spaceship
* Totally retextured.! Lot's of custom textures used,
* 72 (!) spawn points for big servers
* Much bigger spawn area
* Advanced Teleporters (make the map faster)
* New elevator system in stead of the old crane
* And much much more.
--------------------------------------------------------------

=======
CREDITS:
=======

Original map by: Neko_Daisuki
Remake made by: [ZFC] idm
Some of the most used textures in this map are made by: [ZFC] Satch
The drivable spaceship is made by: Fox (got it here from fpsbanana)
Edits to the spaceship made by: [ZFC] idm
Most textured are edited by [ZFC] idm to implement them into the 
map and make them look shiney and 3d like.

Special thanks:

[ZFC] Satch, made some really really nice textures which fit very good into the scene. Without him I wouldn't even have started building this remake.
[ZMoD] Spelworm, helped me a lot with debugging and testing. Thanks!
